text: Georges Appert (1850 – 1934) was a French historian, writer and Japan studies expert.National Diet Library (NDL), Appert, Georges 1850-1934; retrieved 2013-4-2. He was a professor of law at the University of Tokyo.Bibliotheque Nationale de France (BnF), Appert, Georges (1850-1934); retrieved 2013-4-2. ==Career== Appert was a government advisor in Japan from 1879 to 1889. ==Select works== In an overview of writings by and about Appert, OCLC/WorldCat lists roughly 26 works in 43 publications in 5 languages and 132 library holdings. WorldCat Identities: Appert, Georges Some of the works are: * Ancien Japon, 1888 * Du terme en droit romain et en droit français, 1876 * Dictionnaire des termes de droit, d'économie politique et d'administration, 1885 * 日本立法資料全集 (Japanese legislation Complete Works). 別卷 337, 佛國相續法講義 , 2005 * Un code de la féodalité Japonaise au XIIIe siècle, 1900 * 経済学講義 (Economics lecture), 1883 ==Related pages== * Foreign advisors to the government in Meiji period Japan ==References== Category:1850 births Category:1934 deaths Category:Foreign advisors to the government in Meiji-period Japan Category:French Japanologists Category:French historians
